resources.string: The number must be between 1 and 8

If this setting is enabled, every time the accessibility service gets started (a situation that also occurs when the screen is booted), the number of notes to be played will be set to the value in the box below; also the screen will be locked automatically.\n\nIf this setting is disabled, every time the accessibility service is started, it will only start the main service

If this setting is enabled, if the main service is active and the screen is locked, it will be assigned the optimal value to the media volume based on your environment.

You can also restore the volume level prior to this service modification, after its completion.

It increases battery consumption.

In no case your personal data will be collected
If this setting is enabled, when LockscreenEar\'s quick setting is clicked and activated, in addition to starting the main service, the screen gets also locked
If this setting is enabled, if the main service is active and a call is incoming, outgoing or in progress, the lock screen offered by LockscreenEar won\'t get started
Don\'t ask again until the next update
New version available! Do you want to download the update?

-) Fixed some bugs
-) Added dark theme
-) Added volume adjuster controls when the screen is locked
-) Added the diapason button in the training mode
-) Improvements in the UI
-) Changed version name (3.14.2 instead of 3.14 (2)), so version 3.14 (1) of LockscreenEar will not be able to update itself further
You already have the latest version of LockscreenEar installed
LockscreenEar\'s update file could not be deleted

If enabled, the main service undertakes, after the device wakes up (e.g after the keyguard is gone), to start the lock screen offered by LockscreenEar.

If during this activity any action is taken to bypass it, the screen will be locked again.

This service can also be managed via quick setting, which, if specified in settings, also provides to lock the screen.

Please, do not start it if you do not have perfect pitch, you may not be able to unlock your screen!

If enabled, the main service undertakes, after the screen wakes up (e.g after the keyguard is gone), to start the lock screen offered by LockscreenEar.

If during this activity any action is taken to bypass it, the screen will be locked again.

This service can also be managed via quick setting, which, if specified in settings, also provides to lock the screen.

Please, do not start it if you do not have perfect pitch, you may not be able to unlock your screen!
Do you want to deactivate this device administrator?

In order to prevent unpleasant inconveniences, you will have to pass the following test, in which, at each round, you will be offered notes to guess. Once passed, it will always be possible to activate the service.

You can take the test as many times as you want
Allow LockscreenEar to lock the screen
It looks like something is about to happen…

Congratulations! The Easter Egg Challenge is started!

Who knows what will happen now…

Congratulations! You completed the Easter Egg Challenge!

Now you can now choose a maximum of 8 notes to guess, but still not on boot, it might be too dangerous…

Be careful and enjoy LockscreenEar!
Boot list setting number of notes to play
Cancel update and don\'t ask until next update
